articles.title: Rubio says El Salvador offers to accept deportees from US of any nationality, including Americans - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio says El Salvador’s president has offered to accept deportees from the U.S. of any nationality, including violent American criminals now imprisoned in the United States. Rubio says President Nayib Bukele “has agreed to the m…
